about_the_game:
About


Witness the obscure scenario of a massacre, in the shoes of the photographer Bárbara, who received an unusual proposal: To photograph a village with bizarre secrets from decades ago.

What Barbara didn't expect is that everything was more connected to her reality than she imagined. Now, she will have to get involved in this case, destroying her psychological, not knowing what is real or illusion. Until terror becomes routine and survival the ultimate goal.

Explore, discover and survive!


Two Sisters combines the best of the horror and suspense genre in games. The environments allow you to explore and discover secondary stories, discover secrets, and are also an essential instinct for solving puzzles. But be careful, because your inventory is limited and you will need to choose what is most important to carry with you on your journey and use the storage rooms to store what is not useful at the moment to retrieve later.

Interact with drawers, cabinets and even televisions with VHS tape players to discover the secrets they hold. Rewind, pause and play again if you need to get some information from the video. This is just a small demonstration of the investigation possibilities that accompany your journey in Two Sisters.

Your camera. Your refuge in the darkness.


Barbara is a photographer, so her camera is always at her disposal. Use your flash to illuminate the darkest moments or use your viewfinder to see through the lens and discover hidden secrets. In Two Sisters there are no flashlights, candles, or lanterns to take with you, your camera is your only way to see what's in front of your eyes when you can't see.



  • First-person horror: Take on Barbara on an exploration and survival in the ruins of an ancient community with dark secrets in a first-person perspective.
  • 90s environments: The world of Two Sisters is set in the 90s, explore faithful environments inspired by the time.
  • Find out more by exploring: Not everything needs to be explicit, the environments of Two Sisters tell stories.
  • No flashlight, candles and safe light: Barbara wasn't prepared for what was coming and all she has is a polaroid camera with flash to light up her environment... flash.
  • Realistic environments: Two Sisters extracts the best from the Unity graphics engine. Real-time lights and shadows, 4K textures and volumetric atmosphere is just one of the perks.

content_descriptors.notes: Two Sisters has social and political themes and addresses some issues related to violence.
